img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a large, humanoid enemy in a snowy environment. The player character, wielding a weapon with a glowing orange tip, is facing an enemy named "Non-Able," who is in mid-air, possibly attacking or being knocked back. The game's interface is visible, showing health and stamina bars, as well as various icons indicating abilities or items available to the player. The setting is a wintry landscape with snow-covered ground and trees in the background.
